conversation.question: How many trash_can(s) are in this room?
How many wall_clock(s) are in this room?
How many sofa(s) are in this room?
How many table(s) are in this room?
How many door(s) are in this room?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (trash_can, window, table, chair) is the closest to the wall_clock in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (tv, door, window, table) is the closest to the wall_clock in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (door, sofa, window, tv) is the closest to the wall_clock in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (table, chair, window, tv) is the closest to the wall_clock in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (sofa, table, tv, wall_clock) is the closest to the trash_can in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the trash_can and facing the closest sofa, is the closest wall_clock to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the wall_clock and facing the closest trash_can, is the closest sofa to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the wall_clock and facing the closest door, is the closest table to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the door and facing the closest table, is the closest window to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the door and facing the closest chair, is the closest wall_clock to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
